wikipedia_page.main: Dean Walker (born 18 May 1962) is an English former professional association footballer who played as a central defender. He made one appearance in the Football League.

response: David Daniels, Peter Guarasci, Sherman Hamilton, Kevin Jobity, Prosper Karangwa, Andrew Kwiatkowski, Todd MacCulloch, Michael Meeks, Steve Nash, Jerome Robinson, Shawn Swords, Dean Walker. (Coach: Jay Triano)
